game

Class RuleBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.RuleBook

  • public class RuleBook
extends java.lang.Object
    The RuleBook class performs game logic according to the rules specified in this class e.g. determines when the games is over and what specific dice does

        public boolean startingPhase(Monster monster,
                             GamePhase gamePhase,
                             java.util.ArrayList<Monster> monsters)
        Handles the start of a players round. Checks if they are still alive and if they are inside tokyo they will be rewared
        Parameters:
        monster - the monster whose turn it is
        Returns:
        if the monster is still alive

      • rollPhase

        public void rollPhase(Player player,
                      java.util.ArrayList<Dice> dice,
                      GamePhase gamePhase)
        Handles the rolling phase of the game for each player. Lets the player choose if they want to reroll
        Parameters:
        player - the player whose turn it is
        dice - the six rolled dice

      • buy

        public boolean buy(Monster monster,
                   int cardIndex,
                   Deck deck,
                   GamePhase gamePhase,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Monster> monsters)
        Buys a card from the store if the monster has enough energy
        Parameters:
        monster - the monster whose player is buying the card
        cardIndex - the index, in the store, of the card that is being bought
        deck - the games deck
        gamePhase - the game phase
        monsters - the monsters in the game
        Returns:
        if a car was bought or not
